pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculates the Density-Based Clustering Validation Index (DBCV) Index // A metric called 'Density-Based Clustering Validation index' (DBCV) index to evaluate clustering results, following the https://github.com/FelSiq/DBCV 'Python' implementation by Felipe Alves Siqueira. Original 'DBCV' index article: Moulavi, D., Jaskowiak, P. A., Campello, R. J., Zimek, A., Sander, J. (2014, April). "Density-based clustering validation", Proceedings of SDM 2014 -- the 2014 SIAM International Conference on Data Mining (pp. 839-847), doi:10.1137/1.9781611973440.96.
